name: Trailmoji
description: In the Salesforce Ohana, sometimes there are simply no words to describe the excitement! Introducing Trailmoji: the best way to express yourself using your favorite Salesforce characters. With Trailmoji, you can:    Chat with colleagues and peers during Salesforce events (and year-round!) using your favorite characters, sayings, flair and other sticker options.  Share stickers in your favorite apps with simple copy and paste tools.  Use augmented reality to create dancing versions of Astro, Cloudy and Codey in the room with you.  Add calendar reminders to register for our upcoming events like TrailheaDX, Connections or Dreamforce 2019.  Trailmojis latest feature, myTrailmoji, invites users to join a new adventure by creating and sharing versions of Salesforce characters that reflect their personal style, hobbies, and interests. First up is Astro!  Trailmoji, for when there are no words.
